titleStmt.title: To the high and honourable House of Peers now in Parliament assembled. The humble petition of John Levet Doctor of Laws, and Mary his wife
titleStmt.author: Levet, John, LL.D.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on pg. 1: The forgery of Mr. Francis Nevile's lease proved.
Imperfect: cropped on right side and at head with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
